author: Paris Martineau
title: Why Some States Are Resisting Social Distancing Measures
description: Governors of a half-dozen states worry about the economic fallout of forcing businesses to close and say there's no clear guidance from Washington.
content: Alabama hospitals werenearing capacity when Governor Kay Ivey spoke with reporters on Thursday. Despite a dearth of tests, there were more than 630 confirmed Covid-19 cases in the state, more than 100 of whom were hospitalized, and dozens of patients on venti… [+6277 chars]
